tool_description: An API showing all the latest Football transfer news across Leagues in Europe
name: Live Football Transfers in Europe
title: Live Football Transfers in Europe

api_list.name: Get All Live Football Transfers
api_list.description: This returns all the transfer news from a list of news and media sites from all over Europe.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-football-transfers-in-europe.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-football-transfers-in-europe.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get an individual Football Transfer info
api_list.description: This returns the info about a football transfer from a single news source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-football-transfers-in-europe.p.rapidapi.com/news/espn"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-football-transfers-in-europe.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-football-transfers-in-europe.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-football-transfers-in-europe.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
